verses.verse: I love <S%H157><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, because he heareth <S%H8085><s%> My voice <S%H6963><s%> and my supplications <S%H8469><s%>.
Because he hath inclined <S%H5186><s%> his ear <S%H241><s%> unto me <S%H7121><s%>, Therefore will I call upon him as long as I live <S%H3117><s%>.

The cords <S%H2256><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> compassed <S%H661><s%> me <S%H4712><s%>, And the pains of Sheol <S%H7585><s%> gat hold <S%H4672><s%> upon me <S%H4672><s%>: I found trouble <S%H6869><s%> and sorrow <S%H3015><s%>.
Then called <S%H7121><s%> I upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, I beseech <S%H577><s%> thee <S%H4422><s%>, deliver my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
Gracious <S%H2587><s%> is Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and righteous <S%H6662><s%>; Yea <S%H430><s%>, our God is merciful <S%H7355><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> preserveth <S%H8104><s%> the simple <S%H6612><s%>: I was brought low <S%H1809><s%>, and he saved me <S%H3467><s%>.
Return <S%H7725><s%> unto thy rest <S%H4494><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>; For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath dealt bountifully with thee <S%H1580><s%>.
For thou hast delivered <S%H2502><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from death <S%H4194><s%>, Mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> from tears <S%H1832><s%>, And my feet <S%H7272><s%> from falling <S%H1762><s%>.
I will walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> In the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>.
I believe <S%H539><s%>, for I will speak <S%H1696><s%>: I was greatly <S%H3966><s%> afflicted <S%H6031><s%>:
I said <S%H559><s%> in my haste <S%H2648><s%>, All men <S%H120><s%> are liars <S%H3576><s%>.
What shall I render <S%H7725><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> For all his benefits toward me <S%H8408><s%>?
I will take <S%H5375><s%> the cup <S%H3563><s%> of salvation <S%H3444><s%>, And call <S%H7121><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
I will pay <S%H7999><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Yea <S%H5971><s%>, in the presence of all his people.
Precious <S%H3368><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> Is the death <S%H4194><s%> of his saints <S%H2623><s%>.

O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, truly <S%H577><s%> I am thy servant <S%H5650><s%>: I am thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of thy handmaid <S%H519><s%>; Thou hast loosed <S%H6605><s%> my bonds <S%H4147><s%>.
I will offer <S%H2076><s%> to thee the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>, And will call <S%H7121><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
I will pay <S%H7999><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Yea <S%H5971><s%>, in the presence of all his people,
In the courts <S%H2691><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, In the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee <S%H3389><s%>, O Jerusalem. Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>.
